title: Edge of Night is terrible
body: It has low stats and the only way to use the spellshield is hitting it while in brush to prepare for a gank, due to the ridiculous 1.5-second channel. It might as well be a passive like Veil's. Changing the channel to 0.5 seconds would make it a much more practical item that people might actually buy (without regretting it, anyway).

replies.body: Edge of Night is not terrible. Other AD assassin items are too good.
